test.name: create containers
test.url: library(Rlabkey) labkey.security.createContainer(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, parentPath="%projectName%", name = "FromAPI1", title = "From API 1", folderType = "Collaboration") labkey.security.createContainer(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, parentPath="%projectName%", name = "FromAPI2", title = "From API 2", folderType = "Collaboration") labkey.security.createContainer(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, parentPath="%projectName%", name = "FromAPI3", title = "From API 3", folderType = "Collaboration")
test.response: name [1] "FromAPI1" $path [1] "/RlabkeyTest Project/FromAPI1" $title [1] "From API 1" name [1] "FromAPI2" $path [1] "/RlabkeyTest Project/FromAPI2" $title [1] "From API 2" name [1] "FromAPI3" $path [1] "/RlabkeyTest Project/FromAPI3" $title [1] "From API 3" $folderType [1] "Collaboration"

test.name: move container
test.url: library(Rlabkey) labkey.security.moveContainer(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, folderPath = paste("%projectName%", "FromAPI2", sep="/"), destinationParent = paste("%projectName%", "FromAPI1", sep="/"))
